# Shopify Product Taxonomy - Return Reasons: 2026-02-unstable
# Format: {GID} : {Return reason name}

gid://shopify/ReturnReasonDefinition/1   : Unknown
gid://shopify/ReturnReasonDefinition/2   : Changed my mind
